pageSetting.title: 机构存贷客户变动

attribute.value: SELECT YWLB AS KEY,MS AS VALUE FROM CSB_YWLB WHERE MS IN('存款业务','贷款业务')
SELECT YWLB AS KEY,MS AS VALUE FROM CSB_YWLB WHERE MS IN('存款业务','贷款业务')
select xtb.csz from XTB_XTCS xtb where xtb.CSMC = (case when $ywlb$ = 1 then 'CKYJGXMS' when $ywlb$ = 2 then 'DKYJGXMS' end)

select.isEqual: SELECT $tjrq$ TJRQ,JG.KHDXDH,JG.JGDH,JG.JGMC, CKZH.KHH,CKZH.ZHDH, CKZH.ZHHM,CKZH.KHRQ,CKZH.KMH, dmms.dmms khlx, CKMX.YEBD,CKMX.TJRYE FROM ( select t.JXDXDH, t.TJRYE,t.DBRYE, (t.TJRYE-t.DBRYE) YEBD from ( SELECT CKMX.JXDXDH, SUM(CASE WHEN $tjrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ THEN CKMX.ZHYE ELSE 0 END) TJRYE, SUM(CASE WHEN $dbrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ THEN CKMX.ZHYE ELSE 0 END) DBRYE FROM JXDX_CKZHMX_$tjrq_year$ CKMX WHERE ( $tjrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ OR $dbrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ ) GROUP BY CKMX.JXDXDH ) t ) CKMX inner JOIN JXDX_CKZH CKZH ON CKMX.JXDXDH = CKZH.JXDXDH inner JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.JGDH = CKZH.JGDH left JOIN CSB_DMMS dmms ON dmms.DMMC = 'ZHBS' and dmms.dmz = ckzh.zhbs inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on jg.khdxdh=qx.khdxdh WHERE 1=1 AND abs(CKMX.YEBD) >= $yebdfrom$ AND abs(CKMX.YEBD) <= $yebdto$ AND CKZH.ZHHM like '%$khmc$%' AND CKZH.zhbs='$khlx$' and CKMX.YEBD $bdfx1$ 0 ORDER BY abs(CKMX.YEBD) DESC

SELECT $tjrq$ TJRQ,JG.KHDXDH,JG.JGDH,JG.JGMC, CKZH.KHH,CKZH.ZHDH, CKZH.ZHHM,CKZH.KHRQ,CKZH.KMH, dmms.dmms khlx, CKMX.YEBD,CKMX.TJRYE FROM ( select t.JXDXDH, t.TJRYE,t.DBRYE, (t.TJRYE-t.DBRYE) YEBD from ( SELECT CKMX.JXDXDH, SUM(CASE WHEN $tjrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ THEN CKMX.ZHYE ELSE 0 END) TJRYE, SUM(CASE WHEN $dbrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ THEN CKMX.ZHYE ELSE 0 END) DBRYE FROM JXDX_DKZHMX_$tjrq_year$ CKMX WHERE ( $tjrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ OR $dbrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ ) GROUP BY CKMX.JXDXDH ) t ) CKMX inner JOIN JXDX_DKZH CKZH ON CKMX.JXDXDH = CKZH.JXDXDH inner JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.JGDH = CKZH.JGDH left JOIN CSB_DMMS dmms ON dmms.DMMC = 'ZHBS' and dmms.dmz = ckzh.zhbs inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on jg.khdxdh=qx.khdxdh WHERE 1=1 AND abs(CKMX.YEBD) >= $yebdfrom$ AND abs(CKMX.YEBD) <= $yebdto$ AND CKZH.ZHHM like '%$khmc$%' AND CKZH.zhbs='$khlx$' and CKMX.YEBD $bdfx1$ 0 ORDER BY abs(CKMX.YEBD) DESC

SELECT $tjrq$ TJRQ,JG.KHDXDH,JG.JGDH,JG.JGMC, CKZH.KHH,CKZH.ZHDH,CKZH.zzh, CKZH.ZHHM,CKZH.KHRQ,CKZH.KMH, dmms.dmms khlx, CKMX.YEBD,CKMX.TJRYE FROM ( select t.JXDXDH, t.TJRYE,t.DBRYE, (t.TJRYE-t.DBRYE) YEBD from ( SELECT CKMX.JXDXDH, SUM(CASE WHEN $tjrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ THEN CKMX.ZHYE ELSE 0 END) TJRYE, SUM(CASE WHEN $dbrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ THEN CKMX.ZHYE ELSE 0 END) DBRYE FROM JXDX_CKZHMX_$tjrq_year$ CKMX WHERE ( $tjrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ OR $dbrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ ) GROUP BY CKMX.JXDXDH ) t ) CKMX inner JOIN JXDX_CKZH CKZH ON CKMX.JXDXDH = CKZH.JXDXDH inner JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.JGDH = CKZH.JGDH left JOIN CSB_DMMS dmms ON dmms.DMMC = 'ZHBS' and dmms.dmz = ckzh.zhbs inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on jg.khdxdh=qx.khdxdh WHERE 1=1 AND abs(CKMX.YEBD) >= $yebdfrom$ AND abs(CKMX.YEBD) <= $yebdto$ AND CKZH.ZHHM like '%$khmc$%' AND CKZH.zhbs='$khlx$' and CKMX.YEBD $bdfx1$ 0 ORDER BY abs(CKMX.YEBD) DESC

SELECT $tjrq$ TJRQ,JG.KHDXDH,JG.JGDH,JG.JGMC, CKZH.KHH,CKZH.ZHDH,CKZH.zzh, CKZH.ZHHM,CKZH.KHRQ,CKZH.KMH, dmms.dmms khlx, CKMX.YEBD,CKMX.TJRYE FROM ( select t.JXDXDH, t.TJRYE,t.DBRYE, (t.TJRYE-t.DBRYE) YEBD from ( SELECT CKMX.JXDXDH, SUM(CASE WHEN $tjrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ THEN CKMX.ZHYE ELSE 0 END) TJRYE, SUM(CASE WHEN $dbrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ THEN CKMX.ZHYE ELSE 0 END) DBRYE FROM JXDX_DKZHMX_$tjrq_year$ CKMX WHERE ( $tjrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ OR $dbrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ ) GROUP BY CKMX.JXDXDH ) t ) CKMX inner JOIN JXDX_DKZH CKZH ON CKMX.JXDXDH = CKZH.JXDXDH inner JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.JGDH = CKZH.JGDH left JOIN CSB_DMMS dmms ON dmms.DMMC = 'ZHBS' and dmms.dmz = ckzh.zhbs inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on jg.khdxdh=qx.khdxdh WHERE 1=1 AND abs(CKMX.YEBD) >= $yebdfrom$ AND abs(CKMX.YEBD) <= $yebdto$ AND CKZH.ZHHM like '%$khmc$%' AND CKZH.zhbs='$khlx$' and CKMX.YEBD $bdfx1$ 0 ORDER BY abs(CKMX.YEBD) DESC

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( SELECT $tjrq$ TJRQ,JG.KHDXDH,JG.JGDH,JG.JGMC, CKZH.KHH,CKZH.ZHDH, CKZH.ZHHM,CKZH.KHRQ,CKZH.KMH, dmms.dmms khlx, CKMX.YEBD,CKMX.TJRYE FROM ( select t.JXDXDH, t.TJRYE,t.DBRYE, (t.TJRYE-t.DBRYE) YEBD from ( SELECT CKMX.JXDXDH, SUM(CASE WHEN $tjrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ THEN CKMX.ZHYE ELSE 0 END) TJRYE, SUM(CASE WHEN $dbrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ THEN CKMX.ZHYE ELSE 0 END) DBRYE FROM JXDX_CKZHMX_$tjrq_year$ CKMX WHERE ( $tjrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ OR $dbrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ ) GROUP BY CKMX.JXDXDH ) t ) CKMX inner JOIN JXDX_CKZH CKZH ON CKMX.JXDXDH = CKZH.JXDXDH inner JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.JGDH = CKZH.JGDH left JOIN CSB_DMMS dmms ON dmms.DMMC = 'ZHBS' and dmms.dmz = ckzh.zhbs inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on jg.khdxdh=qx.khdxdh WHERE 1=1 AND abs(CKMX.YEBD) >= $yebdfrom$ AND abs(CKMX.YEBD) <= $yebdto$ AND CKZH.ZHHM like '%$khmc$%' AND CKZH.zhbs='$khlx$' and CKMX.YEBD $bdfx1$ 0 ORDER BY abs(CKMX.YEBD) DESC
SELECT $tjrq$ TJRQ,JG.KHDXDH,JG.JGDH,JG.JGMC, CKZH.KHH,CKZH.ZHDH, CKZH.ZHHM,CKZH.KHRQ,CKZH.KMH, dmms.dmms khlx, CKMX.YEBD,CKMX.TJRYE FROM ( select t.JXDXDH, t.TJRYE,t.DBRYE, (t.TJRYE-t.DBRYE) YEBD from ( SELECT CKMX.JXDXDH, SUM(CASE WHEN $tjrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ THEN CKMX.ZHYE ELSE 0 END) TJRYE, SUM(CASE WHEN $dbrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ THEN CKMX.ZHYE ELSE 0 END) DBRYE FROM JXDX_DKZHMX_$tjrq_year$ CKMX WHERE ( $tjrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ OR $dbrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ ) GROUP BY CKMX.JXDXDH ) t ) CKMX inner JOIN JXDX_DKZH CKZH ON CKMX.JXDXDH = CKZH.JXDXDH inner JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.JGDH = CKZH.JGDH left JOIN CSB_DMMS dmms ON dmms.DMMC = 'ZHBS' and dmms.dmz = ckzh.zhbs inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on jg.khdxdh=qx.khdxdh WHERE 1=1 AND abs(CKMX.YEBD) >= $yebdfrom$ AND abs(CKMX.YEBD) <= $yebdto$ AND CKZH.ZHHM like '%$khmc$%' AND CKZH.zhbs='$khlx$' and CKMX.YEBD $bdfx1$ 0 ORDER BY abs(CKMX.YEBD) DESC
SELECT $tjrq$ TJRQ,JG.KHDXDH,JG.JGDH,JG.JGMC, CKZH.KHH,CKZH.ZHDH,CKZH.zzh, CKZH.ZHHM,CKZH.KHRQ,CKZH.KMH, dmms.dmms khlx, CKMX.YEBD,CKMX.TJRYE FROM ( select t.JXDXDH, t.TJRYE,t.DBRYE, (t.TJRYE-t.DBRYE) YEBD from ( SELECT CKMX.JXDXDH, SUM(CASE WHEN $tjrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ THEN CKMX.ZHYE ELSE 0 END) TJRYE, SUM(CASE WHEN $dbrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ THEN CKMX.ZHYE ELSE 0 END) DBRYE FROM JXDX_CKZHMX_$tjrq_year$ CKMX WHERE ( $tjrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ OR $dbrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ ) GROUP BY CKMX.JXDXDH ) t ) CKMX inner JOIN JXDX_CKZH CKZH ON CKMX.JXDXDH = CKZH.JXDXDH inner JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.JGDH = CKZH.JGDH left JOIN CSB_DMMS dmms ON dmms.DMMC = 'ZHBS' and dmms.dmz = ckzh.zhbs inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on jg.khdxdh=qx.khdxdh WHERE 1=1 AND abs(CKMX.YEBD) >= $yebdfrom$ AND abs(CKMX.YEBD) <= $yebdto$ AND CKZH.ZHHM like '%$khmc$%' AND CKZH.zhbs='$khlx$' and CKMX.YEBD $bdfx1$ 0 ORDER BY abs(CKMX.YEBD) DESC
SELECT $tjrq$ TJRQ,JG.KHDXDH,JG.JGDH,JG.JGMC, CKZH.KHH,CKZH.ZHDH,CKZH.zzh, CKZH.ZHHM,CKZH.KHRQ,CKZH.KMH, dmms.dmms khlx, CKMX.YEBD,CKMX.TJRYE FROM ( select t.JXDXDH, t.TJRYE,t.DBRYE, (t.TJRYE-t.DBRYE) YEBD from ( SELECT CKMX.JXDXDH, SUM(CASE WHEN $tjrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ THEN CKMX.ZHYE ELSE 0 END) TJRYE, SUM(CASE WHEN $dbrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ THEN CKMX.ZHYE ELSE 0 END) DBRYE FROM JXDX_DKZHMX_$tjrq_year$ CKMX WHERE ( $tjrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ OR $dbrq$ BETWEEN CKMX.QSRQ AND CKMX.JSRQ ) GROUP BY CKMX.JXDXDH ) t ) CKMX inner JOIN JXDX_DKZH CKZH ON CKMX.JXDXDH = CKZH.JXDXDH inner JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.JGDH = CKZH.JGDH left JOIN CSB_DMMS dmms ON dmms.DMMC = 'ZHBS' and dmms.dmz = ckzh.zhbs inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on jg.khdxdh=qx.khdxdh WHERE 1=1 AND abs(CKMX.YEBD) >= $yebdfrom$ AND abs(CKMX.YEBD) <= $yebdto$ AND CKZH.ZHHM like '%$khmc$%' AND CKZH.zhbs='$khlx$' and CKMX.YEBD $bdfx1$ 0 ORDER BY abs(CKMX.YEBD) DESC ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ SELECT YWLB AS KEY,MS AS VALUE FROM CSB_YWLB WHERE MS IN('存款业务','贷款业务')
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ SELECT YWLB AS KEY,MS AS VALUE FROM CSB_YWLB WHERE MS IN('存款业务','贷款业务')
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select xtb.csz from XTB_XTCS xtb where xtb.CSMC = (case when $ywlb$ = 1 then 'CKYJGXMS' when $ywlb$ = 2 then 'DKYJGXMS' end)
